content: wicked wildlings - hexpaw - cat materials 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn in two colors - main color mc & contrasting color cc embroidery floss or crochet thread in black or a color that will show over mc/cc for x eye nose & stitching one button for second eye felt or fabric for heart & eye patch round eye patch - used felt or fabric to cut a small circle if you prefer to crochet the eye patch - 3 5mm hook in cc 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 slip_stitch into next fo weave in ends - you will sew the eye patch on with the floss head/body - main color 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet x4 around 36 7 increase single_crochet x5 around 42 8 increase single_crochet x6 around 48 9-16 single_crochet around 8r of 48 17 decrease single_crochet x6 around 42 18 single_crochet around 42 19 decrease single_crochet x5 around 36 20 decrease single_crochet x4 around 30 21 decrease single_crochet x3 around 24 22 decrease single_crochet x2 around 18 23-26 single_crochet around 4r of 18 stuff head 27 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 28 single_crochet around 24 29 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 30-31 single_crochet around 2r of 30 32 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 33-37 single_crochet around 5r of 36 38 decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 39 single_crochet around 30 40 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 41 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 stuff body 42 decrease single_crochet around 12 43 decrease around 6 fo add more stuffing if needed to fill in any gaps at bottom close hole weave in end arms make 2 - first three rounds in contrast color 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 switch to mc on last stitch 4-7 single_crochet around 4r of 18 8 decrease single_crochet around 12 9-23 single_crochet around 14r of 12 slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing legs make 2 - first five rounds in cc 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 switch to mc on last stitch 6-10 single_crochet around 5r of 30 11 decrease single_crochet x3 around 24 12-13 single_crochet around 24 14 decrease single_crochet x2 around 18 15-17 single_crochet around 3r of 18 slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing tail in either color or both 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3-30 single_crochet around 28r of 12 ears make 2 - one in mc one in cc 1 4sc into magic_ring 2 increase single_crochet around 6 3 increase single_crochet around 9 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 12 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 15 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 18 7-8 single_crochet around 2r
